entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Monday 3 April 2023
